artist: Painter: After Gorzo da Castelfranco Giorgione; Engraver: Theodorus Van Kessel
description: landscape with a child laying on a blanket at center; 2 men at left, one pointing at the child; seated woman at right and old man playing pipe near her; four figures in background

title: Birth of Paris
